meanings: believe in the immortality of the soul
console the spirit of the deceased

vlive.korean: 진짜? - 언니 잠깐 영혼 어딨어? Really? - Wait, where's your soul? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🐱🐹🐿🦋🍞🐰

vlive.english: Where is the soul in that?

vlive.english: Should I add some soul into it?

vlive.korean: [영혼의 단짝] - 너도 없냐? - 40번! [Soulmate] - You got nothing? - 40. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.104
영혼을 넣었다는 거 아니야? Didn't it mean that he put his soul in it? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.100
vlive.english: Didn't it mean that he put his soul in it?

examples.korean: belief in the immortality of the soul 발음듣기 영혼 불멸에 대한 믿음 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: belief in the immortality of the soul 발음

examples.korean: He’s a lost soul. 발음듣기 그는 길 잃은 영혼이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
We commend her soul to God. 발음듣기 그녀의 영혼을 하느님께 맡기옵니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We commend her soul to God. 발음

examples.korean: They believed that their souls would be condemned to burn in hell for eternity. 발음듣기 그들은 자신들의 영혼이 영원히 지옥불에 타는 벌을 받게 될 것이라고 믿었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They believed that their souls would be condemned to burn in hell for eternity. 발음

examples.korean: The soul is immortal. 발음듣기 영혼은 죽지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
